ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'Yes, and you will be in a despicable state.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You say: "Yes; and you will be lowly made."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Tell them: “Yes; and you are utterly helpless (against Allah).”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "You will certainly be brought back to life in disgrace".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Yes, and you shall then be humiliated."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Aye! and you shall be abject.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (O Muhammad): Ye, in truth; and ye will be brought low.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "Yes indeed, and you will be brought low."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: and verily ye; shall then be despicable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Yes! And you will be utterly humble.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say thou: "Yea, and ye shall then be humiliated (on account of your evil)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Yes, and you shall then be humiliated."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Yes indeed, and you will be totally subdued.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:18] Say: ‘Yes, you will be resurrected, and you will be utterly humiliated!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say (0 Muhammad): Yea, in truth; and ye) and them (will be brought low) abased and humiliated.
